mapper.sql: T1.ESCORT_NO, T1.PATIENT_CARD_NO, T1.HAPPEN_NO, T1.HELPER_CARD_NO, T1.OPER_DATE, T1.REMARK
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM KAOS.ESCORT_MAIN_INFO T1 WHERE T1.ESCORT_NO = #{escortNo}

SELECT
FROM KAOS.ESCORT_MAIN_INFO T1 WHERE T1.HELPER_CARD_NO = #{helperCardNo} AND ( SELECT STATE FROM KAOS.ESCORT_STATE_REC WHERE ESCORT_NO = T1.ESCORT_NO AND OPER_DATE = ( SELECT MAX(OPER_DATE) FROM KAOS.ESCORT_STATE_REC WHERE ESCORT_NO = T1.ESCORT_NO ) ) != 4 ORDER BY T1.OPER_DATE ASC

SELECT
FROM KAOS.ESCORT_MAIN_INFO T1 WHERE T1.PATIENT_CARD_NO = #{helperCardNo} AND T1.HAPPEN_NO = #{happenNo} AND ( SELECT STATE FROM KAOS.ESCORT_STATE_REC WHERE ESCORT_NO = T1.ESCORT_NO AND OPER_DATE = ( SELECT MAX(OPER_DATE) FROM KAOS.ESCORT_STATE_REC WHERE ESCORT_NO = T1.ESCORT_NO ) ) != 4 ORDER BY T1.OPER_DATE ASC
mapper.insert:
SELECT LPAD(KAOS.SEQ_ESCORT_NO.NEXTVAL, 10, '0') FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO KAOS.ESCORT_MAIN_INFO(ESCORT_NO, PATIENT_CARD_NO, HAPPEN_NO, HELPER_CARD_NO, OPER_DATE, REMARK) VALUES (#{escortNo}, #{patientCardNo}, #{happenNo}, #{helperCardNo}, #{operDate}, #{remark})
